sentences.english: Heat evaporate face water very hot, with towel immerge, pigheaded dry rear cover is in 5 minutes on the face.
sentences.chinese: 将蒸脸水烧烫，用毛巾浸入，拧干后盖在脸上5分钟。

sentences.english: Open the rear cover of the headlamp and pull the installed halogen lamp out.
sentences.chinese: 打开照明灯后盖，取出原有的卤素灯泡。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the electronic clock back of the injection mold design process.
sentences.chinese: 本论文介绍了电子钟后盖的注射模设计过程。

sentences.english: Open the back cover to check the electric brush is in good condition.
sentences.chinese: 打开后盖外罩，检查电刷是否正常。

sentences.english: It's usually just snap-fitted together. Otherwise.
sentences.chinese: 后盖通常是按扣咬合的。

definition: body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
case, casing, cabinet or housing (of a computer, photocopier etc)
button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
the back/the reverse side/the wrong side
to peel off (paint)/(fig.) to be exposed/to lose face (Tw)
to dismantle a machine/to terminate a telephone service
flip-top (mobile phone, handbag etc)/to rebuild/to renovate
